title: Best of The Herd: 10/22/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/22/2019
description:
Colin says the Jets lost to the Patriots before their game even started because the Jets are a poorly run business. He proclaims the AFC is over because the Patriots have separated from the rest of the conference. He ranks his top ten NFL teams in the Herd Hierarchy. Plus, Peter King of NBC Sports talks about the Jets allowing their franchise QB to have a microphone on him during Monday Night Football and if the Bears have an obligation to their players and fans to make a change at QB.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
